description: Returns configuration item that is aggregated for your specific resource in a specific source account and region.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregator.

parameters.name: ResourceIdentifier
parameters.description: An object that identifies aggregate resource. The 12-digit account ID of the source account. The source region where data is aggregated. The ID of the Amazon Web Services resource. The type of the Amazon Web Services resource. ResourceName (string) --- The name of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: SourceAccountId
nested_params.description: The 12-digit account ID of the source account.

nested_params.name: SourceRegion
nested_params.description: The source region where data is aggregated.

nested_params.name: ResourceId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: ResourceName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationItem
nested_items.description: Returns a ConfigurationItem object.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version number of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: configurationItemCaptureTime
nested_items.description: The time when the recording of configuration changes was initiated for the resource.

nested_items.name: configurationItemStatus
nested_items.description: The configuration item status. Valid values include:
OK --- The resource configuration has been updated.
ResourceDiscovered --- The resource was newly discovered.
ResourceNotRecorded --- The resource was discovered but its configuration was not recorded since the recorder doesn't record resources of this type.
ResourceDeleted --- The resource was deleted.
ResourceDeletedNotRecorded --- The resource was deleted but its configuration was not recorded since the recorder doesn't record resources of this type.

nested_items.name: configurationStateId
nested_items.description: An identifier that indicates the ordering of the configuration items of a resource.

nested_items.name: configurationItemMD5Hash
nested_items.description: Unique MD5 hash that represents the configuration item's state.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource (for example, sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The custom name of the resource, if available.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The region where the resource resides.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: resourceCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp when the resource was created.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relatedEvents
nested_items.description: A list of CloudTrail event IDs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relationships
nested_items.description: A list of related Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the related resource.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the related resource (for example, sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The custom name of the related resource, if available.

nested_items.name: relationshipName
nested_items.description: The type of relationship with the related resource.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The description of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: supplementaryConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration attributes that Config returns for certain resource types to supplement the information returned for the configuration parameter.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: recordingFrequency
nested_items.description: The recording frequency that Config uses to record configuration changes for the resource.

nested_items.name: configurationItemDeliveryTime
nested_items.description: The time when configuration changes for the resource were delivered.
